00008 #define FILENAMESIZE 100
00009 #define BUFSIZE 1024
00010 
00011 typedef enum \
00012 {NEW,READING_HEADERS,WRITING_RESPONSE,READING_FILE,WRITING_FILE,CLOSED} states;
00013 
00014 typedef struct connection_s connection;
00015 typedef struct connection_list_s connection_list;

00049 int main(int argc,char *argv[])
00050 {
00051   int server_port;
00052   int sock,sock2;
00053   struct sockaddr_in sa,sa2;
00054   int rc;
00055   fd_set readlist,writelist;
00056   connection_list connections;
00057   connection *i;
00058   int maxfd;
00059 
00060   /* parse command line args */
00061   if (argc != 3)
00062   {
00063     fprintf(stderr, "usage: http_server3 k|u port\n");
00064     exit(-1);
00065   }
00066   server_port = atoi(argv[2]);
00067   if (server_port < 1500)
00068   {
00069     fprintf(stderr,"INVALID PORT NUMBER: %d; can't be < 1500\n",server_port);
00070     exit(-1);
00071   }
00072 
00073   /* initialize and make socket */
00074   if (toupper(*(argv[1]))=='K') { 
00075     minet_init(MINET_KERNEL);
00076   } else if (toupper(*(argv[1]))=='U') { 
00077     minet_init(MINET_USER);
00078   } else {
00079     fprintf(stderr, "First argument must be k or u\n");
00080     exit(-1);
00081   }
00082   sock = minet_socket(SOCK_STREAM);
00083   if (sock < 0)
00084   {
00085     minet_perror("couldn't make socket\n");
00086     exit(-1);
00087   }
00088 
00089   /* set server address*/
00090   memset(&sa, 0, sizeof sa);
00091   sa.sin_port = htons(server_port);
00092   sa.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00093   sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00094 
00095   /* bind listening socket */
00096   rc = minet_bind(sock,&sa);
00097   if (rc < 0)
00098   {
00099     
00100     minet_perror("couldn't bind\n");
00101     exit(-1);
00102   }
00103 
00104   /* start listening */
00105   rc = minet_listen(sock,5);
00106   if (rc < 0)
00107   {
00108     minet_perror("couldn't listen\n");
00109     exit(-1);
00110   }
00111 
00112   /* connection handling loop */
00113   connections.first = NULL; 
00114   connections.last = NULL;
00115   maxfd = sock;
00116   while(1)
00117   {
00118     /* create read and write lists */
00119     FD_ZERO(&readlist);
00120     FD_ZERO(&writelist);
00121     FD_SET(sock,&readlist);
00122     for (i = connections.first; i != NULL; i = i->next)
00123     {
00124       if (i->state == CLOSED)
00125         continue;
00126       else if ((i->state == READING_HEADERS)||
00127                (i->state == NEW))
00128       {
00129         FD_SET(i->sock,&readlist);
00130         if (i->sock > maxfd)
00131           maxfd = i->sock;
00132       }
00133       else if ((i->state == WRITING_RESPONSE)||
00134                (i->state == WRITING_FILE))
00135       { 
00136         FD_SET(i->sock,&writelist);
00137         if (i->sock > maxfd)
00138           maxfd = i->sock;
00139       }
00140       else if (i->state == READING_FILE)
00141       {
00142         FD_SET(i->fd,&readlist);
00143         if (i->fd > maxfd)
00144           maxfd = i->fd;
00145       }
00146     }
00147 
00148     /* do a select */
00149     rc = select(maxfd+1,&readlist,&writelist,0,0);
00150     while ((rc < 0) && (errno == EINTR))
00151       rc = select(maxfd+1,&readlist,&writelist,0,0);
00152     if (rc < 0)
00153     {
00154       minet_perror("select failed ");
00155       continue;
00156     }
00157 
00158     /* process sockets that are ready */
00159     for (i = connections.first; i != NULL; i=i->next)
00160     {
00161       if (i->state == CLOSED)
00162         continue;
00163       if (i->state == NEW)
00164       {
00165         init_connection(i);
00166         i->state = READING_HEADERS;
00167         read_headers(i);
00168       }
00169       else if (i->state == READING_HEADERS &&
00170                FD_ISSET(i->sock,&readlist))
00171         read_headers(i);
00172       else if (i->state == WRITING_RESPONSE &&
00173                FD_ISSET(i->sock,&writelist))
00174         write_response(i);
00175       else if (i->state == READING_FILE &&
00176                FD_ISSET(i->fd,&readlist))
00177         read_file(i);
00178       else if (i->state == WRITING_FILE &&
00179                FD_ISSET(i->sock,&writelist))
00180         write_file(i);
00181     }
00182     if (FD_ISSET(sock,&readlist))
00183     {
00184       sock2 = minet_accept(sock,&sa2);
00185       if (sock2 < 0)
00186         minet_perror("couldn't accept ");
00187       else
00188       { 
00189         insert_connection(sock2,&connections);
00190         fcntl(sock2,F_SETFL,O_NONBLOCK);
00191       }
00192     }
00193   }
00194 }

00196 void read_headers(connection *con)
00197 {
00198   int sock2 = con->sock;
00199   char *bptr,*endheaders;
00200   struct stat filestat;
00201   int rc;
00202   char *buf = con->buf;
00203 
00204   /* first read loop -- get request and headers*/
00205   while ((rc = minet_read(sock2,buf+con->headers_read,BUFSIZE-con->headers_read)) > 0)
00206   {
00207     con->headers_read += rc;  
00208     con->buf[con->headers_read] = '\0';
00209     endheaders = strstr(con->buf,"\r\n\r\n");
00210     if (endheaders != NULL)
00211     {
00212       endheaders[2] = '\0';
00213       endheaders += 4;
00214       break;
00215     }
00216   }
00217   if (rc < 0)
00218   {
00219       if (errno == EAGAIN)
00220         return;
00221       minet_perror("Error reading request\n");
00222       minet_close(sock2);
00223       return;
00224   }
00225 
00226   /* parse request to get file name */
00227   /* Assumption: this is a GET request and filename contains no spaces*/
00228   con->ok = true;
00229   bptr = con->buf;
00230   strsep(&bptr," ");
00231   if (bptr == NULL) //Not a valid request
00232   {
00233       con->ok = false;
00234   }
00235   /* get file name and size, set to non-blocking */
00236   else
00237   {
00238     /* get name */
00239     bptr = strsep(&bptr," ");
00240     if (strlen(bptr) > FILENAMESIZE)
00241       {
00242         fprintf(stderr,"Filename too big\n");
00243         minet_close(sock2);
00244         con->state = CLOSED;
00245         return;
00246       }
00247     if (bptr[0] == '/')
00248       bptr += 1;
00249     strcpy(con->filename,bptr);
00250     
00251     /* try opening the file */
00252     con->fd = open(con->filename,O_RDONLY);
00253     if (con->fd < 0)
00254         con->ok = false;
00255     else
00256     {
00257       /* set to non-blocking, get size */
00258       fcntl(con->fd,F_SETFL,O_NONBLOCK);
00259       rc = stat(con->filename,&filestat);
00260       if (rc < 0)
00261         {
00262           perror("error getting file stat ");
00263           //minet_close(sock2);
00264           return;
00265         }
00266       else
00267         con->filelen = filestat.st_size;
00268     }
00269   }
00270 
00271   con->state = WRITING_RESPONSE;
00272   write_response(con);
00273 }
00274 
00275 void write_response(connection *con)
00276 {
00277   int sock2 = con->sock;
00278   int rc;
00279   int written = con->response_written;
00280   char *ok_response_f = "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n"\
00281                       "Content-type: text/plain\r\n"\
00282                       "Content-length: %d \r\n\r\n";
00283   char ok_response[100];
00284   char *notok_response = "HTTP/1.0 404 FILE NOT FOUND\r\n"\
00285                          "Content-type: text/html\r\n\r\n"\
00286                          "<html><body bgColor=black text=white>\n"\
00287                          "<h2>404 FILE NOT FOUND</h2>\n"\
00288                          "</body></html>\n";
00289   /* send response */
00290   if (con->ok)
00291   {
00292     /* send headers */
00293     sprintf(ok_response,ok_response_f,con->filelen);
00294     rc = writenbytes(sock2,ok_response+written,strlen(ok_response)-written);
00295     if (rc < 0)
00296     {
00297       if (errno == EAGAIN)
00298         return;
00299       minet_perror("error writing response ");
00300       con->state = CLOSED;
00301       minet_close(sock2);
00302       return;
00303     }
00304     con->state = READING_FILE;
00305     read_file(con);
00306   }
00307   else
00308   {
00309     rc = writenbytes(sock2,notok_response+written,strlen(notok_response)-written);
00310     if (rc < 0)
00311     {
00312       if (errno == EAGAIN)
00313         return;
00314       minet_perror("error writing response ");
00315     }
00316     con->state = CLOSED;
00317     minet_close(con->sock);
00318   }  
00319 }

00321 void read_file(connection *con)
00322 {
00323   int rc;
00324 
00325     /* send file */
00326   rc = read(con->fd,con->buf,BUFSIZE);
00327   if (rc < 0)
00328   { 
00329     if (errno == EAGAIN)
00330       return;
00331     fprintf(stderr,"error reading requested file %s\n",con->filename);
00332     return;
00333   }
00334   else if (rc == 0)
00335   {
00336     con->state = CLOSED;
00337     minet_close(con->sock);
00338   }
00339   else
00340   {
00341     con->file_read = rc;
00342     con->state = WRITING_FILE;
00343     write_file(con);
00344   }
00345 }
00346 
00347 void write_file(connection *con)
00348 {
00349   int towrite = con->file_read;
00350   int written = con->file_written;
00351   int rc = writenbytes(con->sock, con->buf+written, towrite-written);
00352   if (rc < 0)
00353   {
00354     if (errno == EAGAIN)
00355       return;
00356     minet_perror("error writing response ");
00357     con->state = CLOSED;
00358     minet_close(con->sock);
00359     return;
00360   }
00361   else
00362   {
00363     con->file_written += rc;
00364     if (con->file_written == towrite)
00365     {
00366       con->state = READING_FILE;
00367       con->file_written = 0;
00368       read_file(con);
00369     }
00370     else
00371       printf("shouldn't happen\n");
00372   }
00373 }

00375 int readnbytes(int fd,char *buf,int size)
00376 {
00377   int rc = 0;
00378   int totalread = 0;
00379   while ((rc = minet_read(fd,buf+totalread,size-totalread)) > 0)
00380     totalread += rc;
00381 
00382   if (rc < 0)
00383   {
00384     return -1;
00385   }
00386   else
00387     return totalread;
00388 }  
00389 
00390 int writenbytes(int fd,char *str,int size)
00391 {
00392   int rc = 0;
00393   int totalwritten =0;
00394   while ((rc = minet_write(fd,str+totalwritten,size-totalwritten)) > 0)
00395     totalwritten += rc;
00396   
00397   if (rc < 0)
00398     return -1;
00399   else
00400     return totalwritten;
00401 }

00404 // inserts a connection in place of a closed connection
00405 // if there are no closed connections, appends the connection 
00406 // to the end of the list
00407 
00408 void insert_connection(int sock,connection_list *con_list)
00409 {
00410   connection *i;
00411   for (i = con_list->first; i != NULL; i = i->next)
00412   {
00413     if (i->state == CLOSED)
00414     {
00415       i->sock = sock;
00416       i->state = NEW;
00417       return;
00418     }
00419   }
00420   add_connection(sock,con_list);
00421 }
00422  
00423 void add_connection(int sock,connection_list *con_list)
00424 {
00425   connection *con = (connection *) malloc(sizeof(connection));
00426   con->next = NULL;
00427   con->state = NEW;
00428   con->sock = sock;
00429   if (con_list->first == NULL)
00430     con_list->first = con;
00431   if (con_list->last != NULL)
00432   {
00433     con_list->last->next = con;
00434     con_list->last = con;
00435   }
00436   else
00437     con_list->last = con;
00438 }
00439 
00440 void init_connection(connection *con)
00441 {
00442   con->headers_read = 0;
00443   con->response_written = 0;
00444   con->file_read = 0;
00445   con->file_written = 0;
00446 }
